fashion.name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
fashion.description: The iconic 501 jeans with a straight fit, made from 100% cotton for a classic, rigid feel.  Available in a variety of washes and inseam lengths.

reviews.comment: Love the high rise, but they're a bit stiff at first.

fashion.name: Adidas Originals Trefoil Hoodie
fashion.description: A classic, comfortable hoodie featuring the iconic Adidas Trefoil logo.  Perfect for casual wear.

reviews.comment: Super comfortable and fits great.  Love the classic look.
Good quality, but the sizing runs a little large.

fashion.name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
fashion.description: The classic Nike Air Force 1 '07, a basketball icon turned streetwear staple.  Clean lines and crisp leather.

reviews.comment: Great quality and very comfortable for all-day wear.

fashion.name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic
fashion.description: The iconic Ray-Ban Aviator Classic sunglasses, with their teardrop-shaped lenses and timeless style.  A symbol of cool.

reviews.comment: The classic Aviators.  Always in style.
Great quality, but the fit can be tricky for some face shapes.

fashion.name: Michael Kors Jet Set Travel Tote
fashion.description: A stylish and spacious tote bag crafted from signature Saffiano leather.  Perfect for travel or everyday use.

images.alt: Michael Kors Jet Set Travel Tote Black
Michael Kors Jet Set Travel Tote Brown
Michael Kors Jet Set Travel Tote Detail

reviews.comment: Love this tote!  It's so roomy and stylish.
Great quality, but wish it had a shoulder strap.

fashion.name: J.Crew Classic Cashmere Sweater
fashion.description: A luxuriously soft and timeless cashmere sweater.  An essential for any wardrobe.

images.alt: J.Crew Classic Cashmere Sweater Heather Grey

reviews.comment: The perfect cashmere sweater.  So soft and well-made.
Great quality for the price.  I bought it in multiple colors.

fashion.name: Madewell Perfect Denim Jacket
fashion.description: A classic, slightly oversized denim jacket made from comfortable, durable denim.  The perfect layering piece.

images.alt: Madewell Perfect Denim Jacket Medium Wash
Madewell Perfect Denim Jacket Dark Wash

reviews.comment: The perfect denim jacket!  Great fit and quality.
Love the style, but it runs a little big.

fashion.name: Common Projects Achilles Low
fashion.description: Minimalist and luxurious leather sneakers, handcrafted in Italy.  Known for their clean design and high-quality materials.

reviews.comment: The best sneakers I've ever owned.  Worth the investment.

fashion.name: Everlane The Day Glove
fashion.description: A comfortable and versatile leather flat, designed for all-day wear.  Made from soft Italian leather.

reviews.comment: The most comfortable flats I've ever worn!
Great for work, but they run a little small.
